snippet: Two days before talks over Iran’s disputed nuclear program resume in Geneva, the country’s foreign minister, Mohammad Javad Zarif, sounded an optimistic note.
abstract: Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif says in an interview with a major French television network that a deal between Iran and Western powers aimed at ending a fight over the disputed Iranian nuclear program may be possible in as soon as a week; optimistic note is sounded just two days before negotiations resume.
lead_paragraph: Two days before talks over Iran’s disputed nuclear program resume in Geneva, the country’s foreign minister, Mohammad Javad Zarif, sounded an optimistic note.

headline.main: Iranian Minister Says Nuclear Deal Is Possible This Week
headline.print_headline: Iranian Minister Says Nuclear Deal Is Possible This Week
